item.title: No macros anymore
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

robster2000:

scar is crappy waste of my time

Your fucking kidding me right?

Ok, where to get started?

SCAR = color picking macro
Aryan = java bot

Simple as that. With java you got so many fucking problems it’s unbelevable. Ohh yeah, random colors upon login, scar is donefor! WRONG. “GETCOLOR(X, Y)”.

With aryan you had to update it EVERY time there was an update, and if I recall sometimes there where updates a little late/early and also had more than 1 each week. With scar you didn’t really need to change anything.

There are SO MANY functions in scar it makes color changing look like relaxing in the sun. Lets face it, aryan WAS quick mills, yes, BUT, you may get 3 mill a week with aryan, but with SCAR, your mills get quicker and quicker. Lets see, you got fishing, smithing, woodcutting, merchanting…

Now, I’m no uberleet genious at scar, but playing legit it’s 300k an hour crafting nats using the abyss, the only real problem with that is PKERS. Yes, that’s a bad problem but geesh, not THAT hard to overcome, is it?..

Read full topic

item.title: No macros anymore
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Be quite noobs! (I hate to use that word.)

This update was aimed at taking away Runescape bots (in my opinion), and the only reason they wanted to do that is because there are so many people using them.

Now, if everyone rushes to SCAR, to show them ‘|/ho is b0$$!’ the same thign will happen to SCAR, and they will ahve to concentrate mroe on it, and SCAR will be affected majorly.

People who say SCAR doesn’t work, seriosuly, go do some research.

item.title: No macros anymore

item.description:
@Torrent wrote:

scar is old skool… i knew long time ago that java bots will get ruined soon… now all u java boters will run bac to scar… for the past months i had good time autoing on scar with newer scripts cause not many ppl bothered to use scar… now everyone going to use scar and ruin scar too… so ppl who mainly used java bots should stick to it till it get fixed or sumthing. dont run bac to scar. everyone ran form scar to arayn when they found it it makes good money… so u guys should stick with it and let us scar autoers auto in peace and not get banned its funny how sum(only those few ppl i know lol) were bragging about aryan so much… and they think jagex will never stop aryan

item.title: No macros anymore
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

Sorry Nejat, reviewing that, I sounded a bit harsh there, I was feeling weird. I just meant that your statement was a bit over the top.

Also, if scar doesn’t work for you, learn to make your own scripts, since you made them on your computer they will work better than other peoples. And as for the not being able to do anything else, there is a tutorial some-where on this site about setting up a virtual run-time enviroment or something. Run scar in that and you can do what you want in the real one

Read full topic
